api_list.name: Get News By City of TOI
api_list.description: Get news by city name, if present it shoes the news of the city your selected, from TOI
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/city/agra"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://news-live.p.rapidapi.com/news/city/{city}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "news-live.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get News By newspaper ID
api_list.description: The ID is the name of the newspaper with each words first letter capital, without any space in between.
api_list.code:
